se.cbb.jprime.topology

Class DoubleArrayMatrixMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.topology.DoubleArrayMatrixMap

  • public class DoubleArrayMatrixMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds a double array for each pair (x,y) of vertices of a graph. No generics for the sake of speed. See also GenericMap.
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DoubleArrayMatrixMap

        public DoubleArrayMatrixMap(int size)
        Constructor. Initialises all map values to a null array.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the underlying graph, |V(G)|, i.e., the map will have size*size elements.

      • DoubleArrayMatrixMap

        public DoubleArrayMatrixMap(java.lang.String name,
                    double[][][] vals)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - the map's name.
        vals - the initial values of this map, indexed by vertex number in the first and second dimensions.

      • DoubleArrayMatrixMap

        public DoubleArrayMatrixMap(DoubleArrayMatrixMap map)
        Copy constructor.
        Parameters:
        map - the map to be copied.

      • get

        public double[] get(int x,
           int y)
        Returns the element of a pair of vertices (x,y).
        Parameters:
        x - the first vertex.
        y - the second vertex.
        Returns:
        the values.

      • get

        public double get(int x,
         int y,
         int i)
        Returns the element of the array of a pair of vertices (x,y). No bounds checking.
        Parameters:
        x - the first vertex.
        y - the second vertex.
        i - the index in the element's array.
        Returns:
        the value.

      • set

        public void set(int x,
       int y,
       double[] vals)
        Sets the element of a pair of vertices (x,y).
        Parameters:
        x - the first vertex.
        y - the second vertex.
        vals - the values.

      • set

        public void set(int x,
       int y,
       int i,
       double val)
        Sets the element of the array of a pair of vertices (x,y). No bounds checking.
        Parameters:
        x - the first vertex.
        y - the second vertex.
        i - the index in the array of the vertex.
        val - the value.

      • cache

        public void cache(int[] vertices)
        Caches a part of or the whole current map. May e.g. be used by a Proposer.
        Parameters:
        vertices - the vertices. Null will cache all values.

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Clears the cached map. May e.g. be used by a Proposer.

      • restoreCache

        public void restoreCache()
        Replaces the current map with the cached map, and clears the latter. If there is no cache, nothing will happen and the current values remain. May e.g. be used by a Proposer.
